group_1.narration: Hiko, don't...!@There’s no need to do this...!
I shouldn't have asked you to go out with me...

group_1.textLeft: Hiko...!

group_1.textRight: [chara:800500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: *Pant*...*Pant*...*Hic*...

group_1.textRight: Uh, err, are you okay...? I just came to@bring you some tea...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
*SHRIEK*!!
Aika?!
S-San...! Miyu...!

group_1.textRight: You really are so quick to make a move,@after all...?
There's no talking your way out of this!@I pronounce you guilty!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're wrong, stupid! Let me talk!
I just came to bring her some tea!

group_1.textRight: Well, then, I suppose your job is done, yes?@Shouldn't you be on your way?
Staaaare...

group_1.textLeft: You really don't have any faith in me!

group_1.textRight: I'll hear your defense in the@student department later.
Face trial! Face trial!

group_1.textLeft: Cut that out! Look, I'm leaving, okay?!

group_1.textRight: I truly apologize for the men here.

group_1.textLeft: No, it was my bad too. I got so freaked out@just seeing someone in front of me.

group_1.textRight: Um, since it's here, please have some tea@to calm down...!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Where's Shigurin and Hagurin?

group_1.textRight: They relayed to me that they’re pursuing a Witch@they discovered.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: I'm surprised that Miyabi, the most self-deprecating@one, has gotten so attached to you.
Perhaps our all-natural extrovert has a@shadowy side of her own...?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, pretty much...

group_1.textRight: One that's compelling enough for you to cling to@Magical Girl supremacy...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, duh. Why else would I be the leader?
Really, the thing I'm wondering about right now@is how YOU feel about it.
Shigurin and Hagurin told me about your@strength and your connections, but...
To be real with you, I can't see any reason for@you to care about Magical Girl supremacy.

group_1.textRight: Miyu may be further removed from@the concept than I am.
Oh, um, that's right.
I just carry out Lady San's will.
If I had to pick a reason, umm... It'd be for@building confidence in myself, I guess...
I'm not good at performing in front of people!@I always faint!

group_1.textLeft: To be more precise, you lose self-awareness@and act entirely on instinct.

group_1.textRight: I barely remember anything...
But, without Lady San, I'd be an@out-of-control weapon...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, if I don't stay by her side, both friend and@foe would be in danger.
'Kay, well, that's her deal...
But what's so important about Magical Girl@supremacy to YOU?

group_1.textRight: Sorry, sorry, I wasn't trying to evade the topic.
I also have my own reason for wanting to@cooperate with you on your goals.

group_1.textLeft: Which is?

group_1.textRight: It's all around you.

group_1.textLeft: This community center? I don't get it...

group_1.textRight: It's the Hikarizuka Fire Festival we're preparing@for right now. That's my reason.
It's taught me how to dance and play taiko drums...@The time it's brought me has been simply divine.
But most of all, this festival has given me@my precious friends from the Youth Association...
That's why I want to protect it until the day I die.@It's everything that shapes me.

group_1.textLeft: Nope, still not following you...

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, that's got nothing to do with@Magical Girl supremacy...

group_1.textRight: If I'm superior to others, then the festival that I@participate in will become more sacred as well.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Kyahaha!★
Sure, if a Magical Girl stands above others,@her popularity might skyrocket.
Hey, couldn't you even be worshipped if@that's your thing?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I will become a god.
Unless I become a god, I'll never be able to@protect the fire festival...

group_1.textLeft: Is it really that bad?

group_1.textRight: My dad's company has been sponsoring it,@but...
He said this year will be the last time.@I couldn't change his mind...

group_1.textLeft: This festival is being held in spite of opposition@from people since the beginning.
It's not advantageous to a sponsor's reputation...
And we're heavily dependent on the sponsorship@from Miyu's father's company.
This could be the last year it's held...

group_1.textRight: That's why we want to give it our all this year!

group_1.textLeft: However, I shall not yield! I will undoubtedly@unveil a solution to everyone by next year.

group_1.textRight: Now, it's your turn!

group_1.textLeft: Who, cute lil' me?

group_1.textRight: We told you our reasons!
It's not fair if you don't share!

group_1.textLeft: Ugh, I gotta tell that story again..?
It's kind of a long story. Can't you give this cutie@a break?

group_1.textRight: No, no, no! You have to!!

group_1.textLeft: I just talked about it in the bath, though...
